articles.title: Snoop Dogg Houston concert: 16 hospitalized due to heat - USA TODAY
articles.description: Snoop Dogg's concert just outside of Houston, Texas, resulted in 16 hospitalizations during record heat wave.
articles.content:
Snoop Dogg's concert just outside of Houston on Saturday night left 16 people hospitalized.
